name: Supermagical
developer: Super Awesome Hyper Dimensional Mega Team
publisher: Super Awesome Hyper Dimensional Mega Team
description: Welcome to the incredible world of Supermagical, an awesomely fun puzzle and adventure game. Fight the hordes of Minix, upgrade your powerful warlocks, choose your pet and hat wisely, tame an epic dragon, and travel the three continents of the world in the search of your Evil Witch Sisters!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher. Processor: Intel Dual Core 6600 @ 2.4GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4000, GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 7750 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: i5-2500k@3.3GHz, AMD FX 6300 3.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750, AMD R7 370 Storage: 700 MB available space
